name: Biogenic Upgrade
oracle_text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.
flavor_text:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar

name: Bestial Menace
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
flavor_text:
"My battle cry reaches ears far keener than yours."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

name: Undead Augur
oracle_text: Whenever Undead Augur or another Zombie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"To see past the veil of death, cross it."
—*The Red Book of Mezdrithalik*

name: Syphon Flesh
oracle_text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.
flavor_text: Necromancers deal in commodities far more precious than gold and grain.

name: Spark Reaper
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya

name: Overseer of the Damned
oracle_text:
Flying
When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature.
Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Open the Graves
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: It was a night like any other. It would soon become a night no one would ever forget.

name: Midnight Reaper
oracle_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Midnight Reaper deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.
flavor_text: No one welcomes his visit, yet all must grant him tribute.

name: Lord of the Accursed
oracle_text:
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.
{1}{B}, {T}: All Zombies gain menace until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Curse of Wandering leaves only hatred.

name: Liliana's Mastery
oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+1.
When Liliana's Mastery enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
flavor_text: "There are so many of them. It seems they've just been waiting for someone to serve."

name: Liliana's Devotee
oracle_text:
Zombies you control get +1/+0.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Liliana inspires horror in many and fanatical admiration in a few.

name: Liliana, Death's Majesty
oracle_text:
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Mill two cards.
−3: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
−7: Destroy all non-Zombie creatures.

name: Gravespawn Sovereign
oracle_text: Tap five untapped Zombies you control: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: The Cabal never expected its creations to create servants of their own.

name: Go for the Throat
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
flavor_text: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.

name: Fleshbag Marauder
oracle_text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

name: Feed the Swarm
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.
flavor_text:
"On vile wings and bloody wind, the swarm will rise."
—Skyclave inscription

name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.
flavor_text: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

name: Eater of Hope
oracle_text:
Flying
{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Regenerate Eater of Hope.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Destroy target creature.
flavor_text: Gods can be appeased. Demons, however . . .

name: Dread Summons
oracle_text: Each player mills X cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text:
"Did you have a nice nap?"
—Liliana Vess

name: Dreadhorde Invasion
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

name: Diregraf Colossus
oracle_text:
Diregraf Colossus enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card in your graveyard.
Whenever you cast a Zombie spell, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Death Baron
oracle_text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
flavor_text: For the necromancer barons, killing and recruitment are one and the same.

name: Dark Salvation
oracle_text: Target player creates X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, then up to one target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each Zombie that player controls.
flavor_text: Countless ghouls surged through Thraben's streets, and with them came the city's salvation.

name: Corpse Augur
oracle_text: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.
flavor_text: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.

name: Cemetery Reaper
oracle_text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Every grave cradles a recruit.

name: Butcher of Malakir
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

name: Army of the Damned
oracle_text:
Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

name: Undead Alchemist
oracle_text:
If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player mills that many cards.
Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from their library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

name: Stitcher Geralf
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.

name: Rooftop Storm
oracle_text: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.
flavor_text:
"Let those idiot priests tremble! A new era in unlife begins here and now. Oglor, raise the lightning vane!"
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Hour of Eternity
oracle_text: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.
flavor_text: To serve as an Eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

name: Havengul Runebinder
oracle_text: {2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.
flavor_text: "So many corpses, so little time."

name: Forgotten Creation
oracle_text:
Skulk (This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
flavor_text:
"My earliest work escapes me."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Eternal Skylord
oracle_text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

name: Distant Melody
oracle_text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.
flavor_text: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts—on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

name: Aetherspouts
oracle_text: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, there's plenty for everyone."
—Vickon, Eleventh Company battlemage

name: Victory's Envoy
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor_text: Her paean is the clash of spears, her prayer a battle cry.

name: Unbreakable Formation
oracle_text:
Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
flavor_text: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

name: Riders of Gavony
oracle_text:
Vigilance
As Riders of Gavony enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Human creatures you control have protection from creatures of the chosen type.

name: Return to Dust
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.

name: Orzhov Advokist
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.
flavor_text: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

name: Odric, Master Tactician
oracle_text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.
flavor_text: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."

name: Mikaeus, the Lunarch
oracle_text:
Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

name: Knight of the White Orchid
oracle_text:
First strike
When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

name: Hour of Reckoning
oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy all nontoken creatures.
flavor_text: Those who are chosen do not doubt. Those who remain do not lament.

name: Herald of War
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Herald of War attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Angel spells and Human spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Herald of War.

name: Elite Scaleguard
oracle_text:
When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.
